text: Ema Derossi-Bjelajac (sometimes rendered Derosi-Bjelajac; 3 May 1926 â€“ 20 June 2020) was a Croatian politician. She served as the President of the Presidency of the Socialist Republic of Croatia from 1985 until 1986. She was the first woman to hold a title equivalent to a head of state in modern day Croatia. ==References== ==Other websites== *DEROSSI-BJELAJAC, Ema at lzmk.hr Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of Croatia
title: Ema Derossi-Bjelajac
